sentences.en: Grateful acknowledgment is made for permission to reprint.
sentences.cn: 为获准重印致以深切感谢。

sentences.en: He asked permission to leave the room.
sentences.cn: 他请求离开房间的许可。

sentences.en: He got permission from his commanding officer to join me.
sentences.cn: 他得到指挥官的许可来与我会合。

sentences.en: Permission has not yet been granted for the airline to overfly Tanzania.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司还未获得飞越坦桑尼亚领空的许可。

sentences.en: Planning permission is handed out sparingly.
sentences.cn: 建筑许可证的发放是很谨慎的。

sentences.en: That car is my property; you mustn't use it without my permission.
sentences.cn: 这辆车是我的财产, 你必须得到我的允许才能使用.

sentences.en: The article was reproduced by the special permission of the President.
sentences.cn: 由于总统的特殊允许,这篇文章被复印了一份.

sentences.en: The jet entered Chinese airspace without permission.
sentences.cn: 那架喷气式飞机未经允许闯入中国领空。

sentences.en: The plane circled, awaiting permission to land.
sentences.cn: 飞机在天上盘旋，等候着陆许可。

sentences.en: They cannot leave the country without permission.
sentences.cn: 没有许可他们不得离开这个国家。

sentences.en: They had asked Hong Kong for permission to put into port there.
sentences.cn: 他们请求香港允许他们在那里入港停留。

sentences.en: They have permission to build 200 new houses.
sentences.cn: 他们得到建200座新房的许可。

sentences.en: They used copyrighted music without permission.
sentences.cn: 他们未经允许使用了受版权保护的音乐。

sentences.en: We are grateful to you for permission to reproduce this article.
sentences.cn: 非常感谢您允许我们复印这篇文章。

sentences.en: You must ask permission for all major expenditure.
sentences.cn: 一切重大开支均须报请批准。

sentences.en: You were wrong to take the car without permission.
sentences.cn: 你未经许可就把车开走是不应该的.

words.tran_cn: 许可的；自由的；宽容的；（两性关系）放纵的

phrases.tran_cn: （英）建筑许可证（建造或改建房屋前必须获得的）

trans.tran_en: If someone who has authority over you gives you permission to do something, they say that they will allow you to do it
